cfi.prompt: Please rate how much you agree with the following statements. There are no right or wrong answers.
items: I am good at "sizing up" situations.
I have a hard time making decisions when faced with difficult situations.
I consider multiple options making a decision.
When I encounter difficult situations, I feel like I am losing control.
I like to look at things from many different angles.
Seeking additional information not immediately available helps me attribute causes to behavior.
I avoid looking at things from too many perspectives.
When encountering difficult situations, I become so stressed that I cannot think of a way to resolve the situation.
I try to put myself in other people's shoes.
Having a set routine gives me comfort.
Clear guidelines on what to do and how to do it make a good job.

htq.prompt: Please rate how much you agree with the following statements. There are no right or wrong answers.
items: I tend to dwell on the same issues.
My mind keeps repeating the same thoughts over and over again.
I repeatedly double-check things to make sure they are done properly.
Having a stable and unchanging schedule feels comfortable.
Following a regular and structured schedule is enjoyable.
Life becomes dull if you never take risks and always play it safe.
Restaurant food tastes better when it's something I haven't tried before.

audit.prompt: Please answer the following questions about your alcohol use during the past 12 months.

items.prompt: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
items.name: item1

items.prompt: On a typical day when you are drinking, how many drinks containing alcohol do you have?
items.name: item2

items.prompt: How often do you have six or more standard drinks on one occasion?
items.name: item3

items.prompt: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
items.name: item4

items.prompt: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?
items.name: item5

items.prompt: How often during the last year have you needed a drink first thing in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
items.name: item6

items.prompt: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
items.name: item7

items.prompt: How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because of your drinking?
items.name: item8

items.prompt: Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?
items.name: item9
labels: Yes, But Not In The Last Year

items.prompt: Has a relative, friend, doctor or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
items.name: item10
labels: Yes, But Not In The Last Year
